alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 6:10PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lafayette, northern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 700 PM EST... At 610 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Steinhatchee, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Cross City, Shamrock, Hines, Jonesboro, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Eugene, Jena and Clara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Lafayette
